courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Admission to the MFA program, or graduate standing in English with advanced submission of creative work and  consent of instructor.
description: Directed individual projects, with group discussion in poetry. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Admission to the MFA program, or graduate standing in English with advanced submission of creative work and  consent of instructor.
label: Writing Workshop in Poetry
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Creative Writing major(s) or minor(s). Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign.
